description: silver space ship (a) with red rubbery tip on nose; coin slot in nose cone bottom; spring mechanism to fire coin into slot; red rocket engines in base; one contains key (b)
inscription:
Inscriptions; Decal

red decal on front, in black: [The Bank with the Gold Dome/ BUFFALO/ SAVINGS BANK]
on fins: [ASTRO MFG. USA/ E. DETROIT U.S. PAT. S.N. D45961]; [CAN.PAT./150-21482/ R.D. 1957-A BERZAC CREATION]
title: "Astro Bank" mechanical bank
